titles.title: To amend the charter of Southeastern University of the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 10/28/1997--Introduced. Amends the charter of Southeastern University of the District of Columbia to delete provisions requiring one-third of the University's Board of Trustees to be graduates of such University who are nominated by university alumni.
